title: Joel to play AT&T; Park show in September
body: The legendary Billy Joel will return to San Francisco for the first time in four decades for a concert at AT&T Park later this year. The Sept. 5 show will be the six-time Grammy winner's lone appearance in California in 2015. "We are thrilled to host Billy Joel at AT&T Park for the first time in his illustrious career," Giants president and CEO Larry Baer said in a statement. "It's hard to believe it's been over four decades since Billy last played in the city of San Francisco, but I'm confident the city will welcome him with open arms. Billy's star power, combined with our world-class venue, will make for an unforgettable show." Joel's last headlining performance in San Francisco was at the Great American Music Hall in 1975. Giants season-ticket holders can purchase presale tickets on Jan. 28 beginning at 10 a.m. PT, while public tickets go on sale Jan. 30 at 10 a.m. American Express card holders have the opportunity to buy tickets on Monday, beginning at 10 a.m. Cash Kruth is a reporter for MLB.com. Follow him on Twitter at @cashkruth. This story was not subject to the approval of Major League Baseball or its clubs.
author: Cash Kruth
